name: Motorbike Tour Around Ha Noi
description:
There are many activities that we could do in and around Hanoi – the SE Asia’s Top destination. Experience the best of Hanoi and surrounding on two wheels “A must do in Vietnam”.

The Hanoi highlights “must see”: a series of historical culture thousands of years, such as Temple of Literature, One Pillar Pagoda, Tran Quoc Pagoda, Thang Long citadel. Other famous landmarks of Hanoi such as Hoan Kiem Lake, Long Bien Bridge. Some museums should visit Museum of Ethnology, Museum of the Army. Experience the daily life of Hanoi Old quarter while walking or taking a cyclo around the Hanoi Old Quarter
